content: seasick by gnathalie2 materials size g hook ww yarn i used red heart yarn needle pattern 5 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet rd2 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 15 single_crochet rd3 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 20 single_crochet rd4 & 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 single_crochet rd6 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 25 single_crochet rd7 & 8 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 25 single_crochet rd9 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd10-15 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 single_crochet row1 chain 1 single_crochet across both thicknesses at the end of the row row2 chain 25-32 your choice 2sc in 2nd chain from hook *single_crochet in next chain 2sc in next chain* all the way down slip_stitch in 2nd single_crochet over row3 repeat row 2 till the end of the row slip_stitch fasten_off i left an extra long tail and used it to embroider the detail also stuff the fish before you single_crochet across
